title: Sherry-braised chicken
description: Sherry and chicken are the perfect marriage. Serve with a good helping of sautéed potatoes on the side.

default: 75g/3oz flour, seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper
toasted flaked almonds, to serve: 75g/3oz flour, seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Dust the chicken breasts with the seasoned flour and shake off any excess. Heat a little oil in a large, heavy-based frying pan and fry the chicken breasts until golden-brown on all sides. Remove and set aside.
Add a little more oil to the pan and fry the onion and bacon for 6 minutes.
Place the chicken back into the pan along with the sherry and stock. Bring to the boil then reduce the heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add the olives and butter and stir together until the butter melts, then stir in the parsley and sprinkle over the flaked almonds.
